00048 template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00049 void AbstractCellBasedSimulationModifier<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>::OutputSimulationModifierInfo(out_stream& rParamsFile)
00050 {
00051     std::string modifier_type = GetIdentifier();
00052     *rParamsFile << "\t\t<" << modifier_type << ">\n";
00053     OutputSimulationModifierParameters(rParamsFile);
00054     *rParamsFile << "\t\t</" << modifier_type << ">\n";
00055 }

00059 {
00060     // No parameters to output
00061 }
